recipes.name: Mac and Cheese
steps: Bring a pot of water to a boil. Cook elbow macaroni until al dente, about 8 minutes.
To make a roux, start by melting butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add flour, salt, and pepper and stir until smooth. Slowly pour in milk and stir until the mixture is smooth and bubbling.
Add cheese! Slowly stir in Cheddar cheese until smooth and melted.
Once the macaroni is finished cooking, drain and stir into cheese sauce until coated. Done!

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese
steps: Spread butter on two slices of bread and begin to toast one side of each slice on a pan.
Once toasted, flip to toast the other side
Before fully toasted, add your preffered cheese to one slice, and top with the other slice to create a sandwich
Flip as needed to perfectly toast both sides
Cut diagonally, watch the beautiful cheese pull, and enjoy!

recipes.name: PB&J Sandwich
steps: First toast both slices of bread.
Then on one side of a slice, slather peanut butter.
On one side of the other slice, slather jelly.
Join the peanut buttered and jellied slices of bread together, and you have your sandwich! Enjoy!

recipes.name: French Toast
steps: Mix milk, eggs, nutmeg and cinnamon in a bowl.
Soak slices of bread in egg mixture, but not for too long!
On a skillet, heat up butter.
Toast each slice of bread until golden brown on all sides.
Stack bread on a plate, drizzle maple syrup and top with whipped cream and your choice of berries. Enjoy!

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 350 F
Microwave butter until melted.
In a bowl, mix butter, sugar, vanilla and egg.
Add flour, baking soda, and salt and give a good mix.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Scoop 1.5 tbcd my  sps of dough and place 2 inches apart on a baking sheet.
Bake for 7-10 minute or until cookies are set. Enjoy!
